root.name: Fire and Brimstone
root.description: The evil spirited ruler of the Norse underworld Helheim, Hel, has taken it upon him to conquer the world and is sending his minions into the lands to cause havoc and despair. Out of all the good-hearted Norse Gods, Thor was chosen to face the perils of Hel and make his way through four stages and look for keys which give him access to the next stage. Thor can acquire and find various objects that help him, such as potions and weapons.
